title: Language is Magic - Shari and Michael on the power of language
description:
Shari and Michael talk about the concept that "Language is Magic" 
They explore how language plays a fundamental role in our function as humans, mediating between heaven and earth.  They talk about the ways that language can divide instead of bring together how and their personal stories deeply shape the way they each think on this topic.  

Shari recently stumbled across this short video 
https://mailtrack.io/trace/link/f466b35ccb6a6d1ea2a14d8a3d781fabe89f8855?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyoutu.be%2FWRS9Gek4V5Q&userId=1723276&signature=84fc3499d889f887
discussing the concept of creativity, and she and Michael both think this is a great summarization of some of what they're working through with this topic of language and the ways in which our small story gets interwoven into the larger story.
